TextLibrary.Text: The Sea Serpent slips away beneath the waves. You will need to keep searching.
You have defeated the Sea Serpent. Now you just need to get it back to Drong.
Drong joins you. He will do +10 damage to any animals you fight at the beginning of a battle.
You must travel to Drakenburg and search for a Sea Serpent.
You must return the Sea Serpent to Drong in his Tower.
